messages.body: Good morning. We need to place an order for KNM Coffee.
Good morning. What quantity are you looking at?
We're thinking 10 bags. Our last order in October was 8 bags to 100 Finance Ave.
I have that on record. Current list price is $25 per bag.
Could we also get a quote for Assam tea? We might add it to this order.
Assam tea is $12 per box, 50 sachets. How many boxes?
Actually hold on — we're still checking stock on tea. Let's just do the coffee for now.
Understood. So 10 bags KNM Coffee only. Any discount discussion?
Given our volume we were hoping for something better than list. 8% off?
For 10 bags we can do 5% — $23.75 per bag. 8% I'd need to check.
What about if we add paper and sanitizer to the same delivery? Then it's a bigger order.
Paper $4/ream, sanitizer $8/bottle min 24. If the combined order is above $500 we could look at 6% on the whole thing.
We might need 20 reams and 24 sanitizer. Can you run the total?
10 coffee $250, 20 paper $80, 24 sanitizer $192. Total $522. At 6% that would be $490.68.
Scratch the paper and sanitizer. Budget got cut. Just the 10 bags coffee, and we'll take the 5% if that's still on the table.
Yes. 10 bags at $23.75 = $237.50. Delivery date?
November 28. Same address — 100 Finance Ave.
Noted. PO reference?
PO-2024-11-501. Net 30 from delivery.
Wait — can we move delivery to November 30? Our receiving is closed on the 28th.
We can do Nov 30. I'll note that.
Actually the 28th might work after all. Our facilities team said they can open. Keep it Nov 28.
Reverting to Nov 28. Got it.
Do you have Red Balloons? We have an event in December and might need a separate order.
Yes, $3000 per 1000. We can quote when you're ready.
Don't need it for this order. Just asking for later.
No problem. So we're locked: 10 bags coffee, $237.50, Nov 28, 100 Finance Ave. I'll send the SO.
Invoice to accounts@company.com and a copy to procurement@company.com please.
Will do.
One more thing — last October the delivery note came late. Can you send it on the day this time?
We've changed our process; you'll get it electronically on the day.
And the October order — we had one bag with a torn corner. We didn't claim. Can you just be a bit careful with packaging?
Noted. I'll flag it for the warehouse.
We might need 12 bags in January. Would the 5% still apply?
For 12 bags we could do 5% or possibly 6%. We can confirm when you place the January order.
We're also looking at a second site. Would that be a separate account or under the same terms?
Usually separate POs but we can align terms if combined volume qualifies. We can discuss when you have numbers.
Okay. So for now just this one order — 10 bags, Nov 28. We'll get back to you on January and the second site.
Understood. SO-2024-1103 will be with you shortly.
FOB Singapore, right? We use your delivery.
Yes. FOB Singapore, our delivery included.
Receiving contact is +65 9123 4567. Gate B.
Noted on the order.
If we need to reschedule Nov 28, how much notice do you need?
At least 48 hours so we can adjust the route.
Hope we don't need to. Thanks.
You're welcome. Anything else?
That's it for this order. We'll probably have more questions when we look at Q1.
Oh — do you have decaf in the same KNM range? We might want a couple of bags for the staff room.
We have KNM Decaf at $26 per bag. Min order 2 bags.
We'll skip it for November. Maybe add it to the January order.
Just let us know when you're ready.
And the 5% — is it off list before or after we apply early payment discount?
5% is off list. If you take early payment discount that's on top of the net amount.
We're still deciding on payment timing. We'll stick to Net 30 for now.
Can the SO reference our cost centre? We have CC-101 for coffee.
We can add it in the reference or notes field. What exactly should we put?
Just 'CC-101' in the order reference or description.
I'll add it to the SO.
Last time the driver called an hour before arrival. Same again?
Yes. Our standard is to call the receiving contact about an hour before.
We might have a different person on the dock that day. I'll send you the backup number when I have it.
You can send it anytime before the 28th and we'll update the delivery order.
What if we need to add 2 more bags after we've placed the order but before the 28th?
If there's space on the truck we can add. Best to ask at least 3 days before. Price would be same $23.75 per bag.
Hope we don't need to. Stock is tight.
Is the coffee origin still the same? We had a note from quality that they want to track origin.
Same origin as your October batch. We can put origin on the packing list or COA if you need it.
Packing list is enough. Thanks.
Noted.
We're done. Thanks for your patience with all the back and forth.
